sn41.9:1.1: Tena kho pana samayena acelo kassapo macchikasandam anuppatto hoti cittassa gahapatino puranagihisahayo.
sn41.9:1.2: Assosi kho citto gahapati: “acelo kira kassapo macchikasandam anuppatto amhakam puranagihisahayo”ti.
sn41.9:1.3: Atha kho citto gahapati yena acelo kassapo tenupasankami; upasankamitva acelena kassapena saddhim sammodi.
sn41.9:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati acelam kassapam etadavoca:
sn41.9:1.7: “Imehi pana te, bhante, timsamattehi vassehi atthi koci uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
sn41.9:1.8: “Imehi kho me, gahapati, timsamattehi vassehi pabbajitassa natthi koci uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo, annatra naggeyya ca mundeyya ca pavalanipphotanaya ca”ti.
sn41.9:1.9: Evam vutte, citto gahapati acelam kassapam etadavoca:
sn41.9:1.11: Dhammassa svakkhatata yatra hi nama timsamattehi vassehi na koci uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato abhavissa phasuviharo, annatra naggeyya ca mundeyya ca pavalanipphotanaya ca”ti.
sn41.9:2.2: “Mayhampi kho pana, bhante, timsamattani vassani upasakattam upagatassa”ti.
sn41.9:2.3: “Imehi pana te, gahapati, timsamattehi vassehi atthi koci uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
sn41.9:2.5: Ahanhi, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.9:2.6: Ahanhi, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, vitakkavicaranam vupasama … dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.9:2.7: Ahanhi, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.9:2.8: Ahanhi, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.9:2.9: Sace kho panaham, bhante, bhagavato pathamataram kalam kareyyam, anacchariyam kho panetam yam mam bhagava evam byakareyya:
sn41.9:2.10: ‘natthi tam samyojanam yena samyojanena samyutto citto gahapati puna imam lokam agaccheyya’”ti.
sn41.9:2.11: Evam vutte, acelo kassapo cittam gahapatim etadavoca:
sn41.9:2.13: Dhammassa svakkhatata, yatra hi nama gihi odatavasano evarupam uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanavisesam adhigamissati phasuviharam.
sn41.9:2.14: Labheyyaham, gahapati, imasmim dhammavinaye pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
sn41.9:3.1: Atha kho citto gahapati acelam kassapam adaya yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn41.9:3.5: Alattha kho acelo kassapo imasmim dhammavinaye pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
sn41.9:3.6: Acirupasampanno ca panayasma kassapo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn41.9:3.7: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn41.9:3.8: Annataro ca panayasma kassapo arahatam ahositi.
